# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $140. This is a special opportunity to save $10 while securing a high-quality item that meets your needs. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
